additional

Class SimPareto

  • java.lang.Object
    • additional.SimPareto

  • public class SimPareto
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows for the simulation of random variables which are Pareto-distributed. We do not take errors into account. Possible solutions to handle such things would be to use throw exception and try.

      • getPareto

        public static double getPareto(double alpha,
               double c,
               java.util.Random rgen)
        This method generates one realization of a Pareto distributed random variable.
        Parameters:
        alpha - the first parameter of the Pareto distribution.
        c - the second parameter of the Pareto distribution.
        rgen - the uniform number generator to be used.
        Returns:
        a realization of Pareto-distributed rv.

      • getUniform

        public static double getUniform(java.util.Random rgen)
        This method generates one realization of a uniformly distributed random variable within the interval (0,1)
        Parameters:
        rgen - the random number generator to be used.
        Returns:
        a realization of a uniformly (0,1)-distributed rv.

      • getUniformInt

        public static double getUniformInt(double min,
                   double max,
                   java.util.Random rgen)
        This method generates one realization of a uniformly distributed random variable within the interval (min,max)
        Parameters:
        min - the lower bound of the interval.
        max - the upper bound of the interval.
        rgen - the random number generator to be used.
        Returns:
        a realization of a uniformly (0,1)-distributed rv.
